TopicTitle: (A-Tech Request) Minimus orbit - ground - orbit refuel vessel

Articles.Content:
I am looking for a minimus orbit to ground and back fuel transfer vessel. This ship must be able to carry a moderate amount of fuel for base depositing, while still maintaining the ability to re-orbit minimus and dock at an orbital refuelling station. This ship must be compatible with the A-Tech C1, able to dock with it on surface.

Thanks in advance, looking forward to at least one user friendly submission to establish as my colony fuel workhorse.

Please construct to be compatible with the C1, found at the following thread:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/27806-Allister-Technology-Colonization-Project

Edited May 8, 2013 by Allister
